story_25_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
All right. Time for round four of the finals...
Looks like we’re going up against Will and
Karen’s team.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Heh heh! We’ve been watching your battles,
you know.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You’ve fought tremendously—especially when you
went toe-to-toe with Elesa’s team!
story_25_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You battled so bravely, even the audience was
inspired to rise up and fight back against
Team Break.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: An impressive feat, I must admit!
story_25_02000/2401_0401_0700_10:
What a nice, sincere answer. No doubt that
attitude of yours is how you managed to
motivate all those sync pairs to take a stand.
story_25_02000/2401_0302_0800_10: It’s all thanks to everybody there!
story_25_02000/2401_0402_0900_10: I see you know the importance of being humble.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I’m glad it turned out OK, but I sure hope we
never have to battle in chaos like that again.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Yeah. When I see people and Pokémon in trouble,
I can’t stop myself from rushing in and helping
them out.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
That shouldn’t be a problem. From what I hear,
they’ve tightened up security for the event.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
So you kids can keep your eyes on the battle right
in front of you.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
That being said, if any trouble does break out,
I, for one, plan to sit tight and stay out of it.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Staying out of things is a real talent of
yours, Nanu...
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Still, it’s reassuring to know that there will be
more security. Thanks for telling us.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Heh heh. It seems you’re every bit as tough to pin
down as I’ve heard, Nanu.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: Oh? And where’d you hear that, boy?
story_25_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: From a man I think you might know.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Hehe. Speak of the devil—it looks like he’s finally
shown up.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Well, hello again, [Name:PlayerNickname ] and
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] teammates.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2300_10: You teamed up with Will and Karen?
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2400_10: Well, after some twists and turns, yes.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Looks like I was right when I said we’d be fighting
on opposing teams the next time we meet,
huh, Nanu?
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Got yourself some snazzy new duds since I last
saw you, huh? And a snazzy new partner, to boot.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: Why, yes. Allow me to introduce you to Sharpedo.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_2900_10:
I realized a more aggressive fighting style would
help me bring out the best plays for this team.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_3000_10:
It seems the sheer thrill of my new style really
inspired the designer of these sygna suits, and...
well, the outfit clearly speaks for itself.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Isn’t Sharpedo supposed to be so ferocious that it’s
called the bully of the se—
story_25_02000/2401_1001_3300_10: Oops! Sorry about that! He’s a bit of a wild one.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
But his fearlessness more than makes up for it.
He doesn’t mind taking a few licks if it means
winning the battle.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_3600_10: My team and I are going to take the entire PML!
story_25_02000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Gotta say, you look a lot happier now than when
you were teamed up with me.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_3900_10: Well, what say you, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="boy" F="girl" ]?
story_25_02000/2401_1001_4000_10: Feel up to taking this team down?
story_25_02000/2401_0401_4200_10:
Now you’re talking. Sounds like it’s time for
this jaded old man to muster up the same
youthful energy.
story_25_02000/2401_0402_4400_10:
Now you’re talking. Sounds like it’s time for
this jaded old man to muster up the same
youthful energy.
story_25_02000/2401_1001_4500_10: Don’t take it too serious, now!
story_25_02000/2401_1001_4600_10: I’m putting everything on the line in this battle.
